Desctription.value: Computer is not plugged in: ...Your brain is probably damaged.
Loud noise while loading: Turn off your computer immediately!!!
No sound: You should try installing your sound card driver.
No Internet: Plug your ethernet cable in and try installing your ethernet driver.
Internet Explorer: You're using IE?!?! PLease stop. Use Google Chrome isntead!
PC keeps restarting: Something might be overheating (CPU).
High CPU temp: Your computer is overheating!!! Try cleaning it or take it to the nearest ServiceCenter.
High CPU temp and loud noise: You probably have hardware issues. Contact the nearest ServiceCenter.
Your system works properly, No problems found.
